comment: Excellent class to learn excel and access, I'd recommend this teacher and she is great to work with, plenty of opportunities for extra credit, well laid out and perfect pace for the class.
Tons of bonus point opportunities and is nice grader. Test are pretty easy and explains the content very well. If you don't get an A in this class, it is honestly your fault for not locking in!

Professor Wei's class was manageable. Provides extra credit for attendance. There are weekly quizzes, if you take notes on the power-points then you'll do well. The exams are lockdown browser webcam but a note sheet is available. She goes over the assignments in class. And a final group project. She gives you enough preparation time for everything!

Suuuch an easy class! If you go to class then she literally does the assignments/projects and you just copy what she's doing. Also a very kind and caring lady. She takes attendance, but its not mandatory, but def recommend you go because you will have no other work to do outside of that class because you will have already done it along with her!!

Easy A. Just memorize the PPTs and you'll get an A. Every assignment worth 55 pts is easy (Final Grade is out of 600+ pts).Connect used for quizzes and test.Cheat sheet allowed on test. She does the assignments  in class with you. Group project has not been made available but that will probably be the only difficult assignment.

Professor Wei was amazing and INCREDIBLY helpful especially when it comes to excel projects. make sure to attend lectures especially on the days when she goes over the excel project it's a guaranteed 100 if you do. tests are very easy and you get a cheat sheet. and she will help with anything. one of the best professors at KSU

Take IS with this professor!! While going to class isn't mandatory, she gives out extra credit for coming. There is a few projects that she does with the class, and one group project at the end. Tests are lockdown/webcam, but she gives out a study guide that is helpful. She reads off the slides for the lectures but she is caring and an easy prof!
